item.title: Mastering Load Balancing with Nginx and HAProxy
item.description: Mastering Load Balancing with Nginx and HAProxy # Introduction # Load balancing is a critical component for distributing internet traffic across multiple servers, ensuring that your website or application can handle large amounts of traffic without a hitch.
